name: Mrs. Hudson
message: P-Please... just forgive me already！

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: I can't bear this kind of humiliation...
It's Mrs. Hudson's voice.
So, after all, the woman whose moans I could hear even in my room was...
But who on earth is with her？
I just can't believe Mrs. Hudson would do something like that.

name: Thomas
message: But down here, you ain't saying no.

name: Thomas
message: It's been a while, and you sure look happy.
Crying so many tears like this...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Don't say such terrible things！

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ah... d-don't be so rough... aah！

name: Thomas
message: You'd better not try to defy me.
Because I know everything.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: W-what is it that you know...?

name: Thomas
message: Your husband, and your brat too.
Should I tell Jonathan or Gardner about it?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Stop... Please, anything but that...

name: Thomas
message: Can't say it, huh.
I have no idea what kind of guy you’re screwing every night, or what a freak the kid you made turned out to be.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Why... why do you know about that...?

name: Thomas
message: I see right through everything.
Come on, if you don't want me to talk, then shake your ass more！

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Hah... n-no, I can't...

name: Thomas
message: Kuh... Of course, it’s been a long time, so damn, you’re squeezing me like crazy.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: N-no！

name: Thomas
message: Feels like it’s gonna tear off.
This is some impressive stuff you've got here.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Please, don't say things like that...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Nnngh...ah...
What the hell is going on here.
That Mrs. Hudson, with Thomas.........
I just can’t believe it.
But there’s no mistaking that the one kneeling naked on the bed, taking Thomas from behind, is none other than Mrs. Hudson herself.

name: Thomas
message: You still come to see me from time to time, right？
My husband and son, y'know.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Please, can we just drop that already......
Someone might overhear us.

name: Thomas
message: Even if it's a son, it's still a damn beast.
Are you making even your freak of a son do it？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Forgive me... Please have mercy！
Mrs. Hudson's missing husband is coming to see her？
They're saying something about a kid or whatever.
What do they mean by 'like a monster'？
This is the first time I've even heard that Hudson had a kid, but why isn't that kid at the Fish Scale Inn?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ah... I don't care what happens to me.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Please, just don't talk about that...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Please, don't talk about my husband and child anymore.

name: Thomas
message: そうしてほしいなら、もっと俺を楽しませるんだな。
Say　what　you　want　me　to　do.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: あなたは‥‥‥‥あなたは酷い人です！

name: Thomas
message: Say what you want me to do.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: もっと‥‥‥もっと激しく突いて下さい‥‥‥

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: わたくしが‥‥‥裂けるぐらい‥‥‥‥

name: Thomas
message: へっ、ようやく本音が出てきたか。

name: Thomas
message: I'll do just what you want！

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: ああぁぁん！

name: Thomas
message: さすがにガキがいるだけあって、こっちの方もよく使い込　　　　　　まれてるな、毎晩旦那にしてもらってたんだろう？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: 違います、わたくしはそんな‥‥‥

name: Thomas
message: 言えよ、本当はどうして欲しいのか。

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Uh... nngh... more... harder.

name: Thomas
message: Even if you pretend to be a goody two-shoes, you’re like that after all！
You're just a fucking whore.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Awful......how could something so cruel......

name: Thomas
message: Don't go acting all high and mighty after you were grinding your hips on that filthy beast.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: No more... Please, just forgive me already！

name: Thomas
message: That's rich coming from you.
Don't let it overflow too much, you'll get my clothes dirty.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Nnngh... Th-that's... that's too much! That's just cruel!

name: Thomas
message: Why don't you try being a little more honest?
Honestly, you don't totally hate it, do you?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: N-no, that's not it.............

name: Thomas
message: Oh yeah？
Alright, then if I do this...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ahhn！

name: Thomas
message: If you hate it that much, I'll stop.
I'm not a bad guy by nature, you know.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: だ、駄目‥‥‥お願い‥‥‥つ、続けて‥‥‥
What the hell.
Mrs. Hudson with Thomas......
It seems her way of looking at Thomas had always been unusual, but so that's what was going on.
Hudson-san has always been in this kind of relationship with Thomas, huh.
Even so, what exactly does the story Thomas mentioned about Mr. Hudson's husband and child mean?
I wonder what they mean by 'filthy beast.'
Is it just a metaphor to mock the lady？
